mapper.insert: insert into assa_member(user_email, password, name, nickname, phone, gender, birth) values(#{userEmail}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone},#{gender}, #{birth})
mapper.update: update assa_member set name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname}, phone=#{phone}, gender=#{gender}, birth=#{birth} where user_no=#{userNo} and password=#{password}
update assa_member set password=#{rePassword}, name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname}, phone=#{phone}, gender=#{gender}, birth=#{birth} where user_no=#{userNo} and password=#{password}
